DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study aim increase access diabetes education deliver culturally-appropriate community set involve different member diabetes care team include physician , diabetes educator , health promoters/community health worker . Diabetes medical group visit hold Grady North DeKalb satellite clinic third Thursday month start October 2009 . There two cohort patients- English speaking patient Spanish speaking patient . Each group schedule 4 2-hour group visit throughout period 9 month . These visit every 8 week group . During visit , patient see physician , attend diabetes education session , re-fill diabetes medication receive lab order .
